These tumor occur almost exclusively child , usually diagnose child age 5 year . The group heterogeneous include relatively common pediatric tumor well rare tumor . Three common type embryonal tumor child neuroblastoma , Wilms tumor ( WT ) , retinoblastoma . Other embryonal tumor , include medulloblastoma rhabdomyosarcoma .
